phrases.phrase: 길고 짧은 것은 대어 보아야 안다
meanings: One needs to measure to see if something is short or long

vlive.korean: 시간도 제일 길고... - 시간도 제일... - 40초에 65데시벨이면... How could you get the longest time and... - Yeah. - 40 seconds with 65dB is... 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.2 2020 : MYSTERY MYSTERY #2
vlive.english: How could you get the longest time and... - Yeah. - 40 seconds with 65dB is...

vlive.korean: 머리 길고... After growing my hair... 듣기 View video NCT : 안녕 こんにちは hello

examples.korean: They began the long slow haul to the summit. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 정상까지의 길고 느린 여정을 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
